text: Greatest Hits (subtitled Entertainment Through Pain) is a compilation of Throbbing Gristle material. ==Track listing== # "Hamburger Lady" – 4:11 # "Hot on the Heels of Love" – 4:21 # "Subhuman" – 2:58 # "AB/7A" – 4:49 # "Six Six Sixties" – 2:07 # "Blood on the Floor" – 1:16 # "20 Jazz Funk Greats" – 2:42 # "Tiab Guls" – 4:19 # "United" – 4:05 # "What a Day" – 4:36 # "Adrenalin" – 4:01 # (untitled) – 0:39 ==References== Category:1981 greatest hits albums Category:Throbbing Gristle compilation albums Category:Rough Trade Records compilation albums
title: Greatest Hits (Throbbing Gristle album)
